description: Given five points in a plane, no three collinear, show that some four form a convex quadrilateral.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1962_a1
(S : Set (ℝ × ℝ))
(hS : S.ncard = 5)
(hnoncol : ∀ s ⊆ S, s.ncard = 3 → ¬Collinear ℝ s)
: ∃ T ⊆ S, T.ncard = 4 ∧ ¬∃ t ∈ T, t ∈ convexHull ℝ (T \ {t})

description: Prove f(n)=n for multiplicative strictly increasing f with f(2)=2.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1963_a2
(f : ℕ → ℕ)
(hfpos : ∀ n, f n > 0)
(hfinc : StrictMonoOn f (Set.Ici 1))
(hf2 : f 2 = 2)
(hfmn : ∀ m n, m > 0 → n > 0 → IsRelPrime m n → f (m * n) = f m * f n)
: ∀ n > 0, f n = n

description: For 6 distinct points in plane, show D/d >= sqrt(3).
theorem:
theorem putnam_1964_a1
(A : Finset (EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2)))
(hAcard : A.card = 6)
(dists : Set ℝ)
(hdists : dists = {d : ℝ | ∃ a b : EuclideanSpace ℝ (Fin 2), a ∈ A ∧ b ∈ A ∧ a ≠ b ∧ d = dist a b})
: (sSup dists / sInf dists ≥ Real.sqrt 3)

description: Prove binomial identity involving floor function.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1965_a2
: ∀ n > 0, ∑ r ∈ Finset.Icc 0 ((n - 1)/2), ((n - 2*r) * Nat.choose n r / (n : ℚ))^2 = (Nat.choose (2*n - 2) (n - 1))/(n : ℚ)

description: Prove xy = f(x+y) - f(x-y) for specific sequence sum.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1966_a1
(f : ℤ → ℤ)
(hf : f = fun n : ℤ => ∑ m ∈ Finset.Icc 0 n, (if Even m then m / 2 else (m - 1)/2))
: ∀ x y : ℤ, x > 0 ∧ y > 0 ∧ x > y → x * y = f (x + y) - f (x - y)

description: Prove |a1| + |2a2| + ... + |nan| <= 1 given |f(x)| <= |sin x|.
header:
import Mathlib
open Nat Topology Filter
theorem:
theorem putnam_1967_a1
(n : ℕ) (hn : n > 0)
(a : Set.Icc 1 n → ℝ)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(hf : f = (fun x : ℝ => ∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, a i * Real.sin (i * x)))
(flesin : ∀ x : ℝ, abs (f x) ≤ abs (Real.sin x))
: abs (∑ i : Set.Icc 1 n, i * a i) ≤ 1

description: Prove 22/7 - pi = integral of x^4(1-x)^4/(1+x^2).
theorem:
theorem putnam_1968_a1
: 22/7 - Real.pi = ∫ x in (0)..1, x^4 * (1 - x)^4 / (1 + x^2)

description: Prove existence of rationals r,s satisfying approximation conditions.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1968_a2
(a b c d e f : ℤ)
(ε : ℝ)
(hne : a * d ≠ b * c)
(hε : ε > 0)
: ∃ r s : ℚ, (|r * a + s * b - e| : ℝ) ∈ Set.Ioo 0 ε ∧ (|r * c + s * d - f| : ℝ) ∈ Set.Ioo 0 ε

description: Prove determinant formula for |i-j| matrix.
header:
import Mathlib
open Matrix Filter Topology Set Nat
theorem:
theorem putnam_1969_a2
(D : (n : ℕ) → Matrix (Fin n) (Fin n) ℝ)
(hD : D = fun (n : ℕ) => λ (i : Fin n) (j : Fin n) => |(i : ℝ) - (j : ℝ)| )
: ∀ n, n ≥ 2 → (D n).det = (-1)^((n : ℤ)-1) * ((n : ℤ)-1) * 2^((n : ℤ)-2)

description: Prove power series of e^ax cos(bx) has 0 or infinitely many zero coefficients.
header:
import Mathlib
open Metric Set EuclideanGeometry
theorem:
theorem putnam_1970_a1
(a b : ℝ)
(ha : a > 0)
(hb : b > 0)
(f : ℝ → ℝ)
(f_def : f = fun x : ℝ => Real.exp (a*x) * Real.cos (b*x))
(p : ℕ → ℝ)
(hp : ∃ c : ℝ, c > 0 ∧ ∀ x ∈ ball 0 c, ∑' n : ℕ, (p n)*x^n = f x)
(S : Set ℕ)
(S_def : S = {n : ℕ | p n = 0})
: S = ∅ ∨ ¬Finite S

description: Prove no points in punctured disk satisfy given polynomial equation.
header:
import Mathlib
open Metric Set EuclideanGeometry
theorem:
theorem putnam_1970_a2
(A B C D E F G : ℝ)
(hle : B^2 - 4*A*C < 0)
: ∃ δ > 0, ¬∃ x y : ℝ, x^2 + y^2 ∈ Set.Ioo 0 (δ^2) ∧
A*x^2 + B*x*y + C*y^2 + D*x^3 + E*x^2*y + F*x*y^2 + G*y^3 = 0

description: Prove lattice point exists in interior of segment between 9 lattice points.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1971_a1
(S : Set (ℤ × ℤ × ℤ))
(hS : S.ncard = 9)
(L : (ℤ × ℤ × ℤ) × (ℤ × ℤ × ℤ) → Set (ℝ × ℝ × ℝ))
(hL : L = fun ((a, b, c), (d, e, f)) =>
{(t*a + (1-t)*d, t*b + (1-t)*e, t*c + (1-t)*f) | t ∈ Ioo (0 : ℝ) 1})
: ∃ x y z : ℤ, ∃ P Q : ℤ × ℤ × ℤ, P ∈ S ∧ Q ∈ S ∧ P ≠ Q ∧ ((x : ℝ), (y : ℝ), (z : ℝ)) ∈ L (P, Q)

description: Determine all polynomials P with P(x^2+1) = P(x)^2+1 and P(0)=0.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1971_a2
    (P : Polynomial ℝ) :
    (P.eval 0 = 0 ∧ (∀ x : ℝ, P.eval (x^2 + 1) = (P.eval x)^2 + 1)) ↔ P ∈ putnam_1971_a2_solution

description: Find area of region R defined by |x|-|y|<=1 and |y|<=1.
header:
import Mathlib
open MeasureTheory
abbrev putnam_1988_a1_solution : ℝ := 6
theorem:
theorem putnam_1988_a1
    (R : Set (Fin 2 → ℝ))
    (hR : R = {p | |p 0| - |p 1| ≤ 1 ∧ |p 1| ≤ 1}) :
    (volume R).toReal = putnam_1988_a1_solution

description: Determine value of product involving cubic roots.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1985_a1
: ∏ n in Finset.Icc 0 999, ((n : ℝ)^3 - 1) / ((n : ℝ)^3 + 1) = 2/3

description: Find S_n involving floor of square roots.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1986_a1
(S : ℕ → ℤ)
(hS : S = fun n => ∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, (Int.floor (Real.sqrt k) : ℤ))
: ∀ n > 0, S n = n * Int.floor (Real.sqrt n) + (2 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n))^3 + 3 * (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n))^2 + Int.floor (Real.sqrt n)) / 6 - (Int.floor (Real.sqrt n)) * ((Int.floor (Real.sqrt n))^2 + Int.floor (Real.sqrt n)) / 2

description: Find all polynomials with real coefficients satisfying given functional equation.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1987_a1
(f : Polynomial ℝ)
(hf : ∀ x : ℝ, f.eval x * f.eval (2*x^2) = f.eval (2*x^3 + x))
: f = 1 ∨ ∃ n : ℕ, f = (Polynomial.X^2 + 1)^n

description: Prove formula for integer post office problem.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1989_a1
: ∀ n > 0, (∃! a : Fin n → ℤ, ∀ i : Fin n, 0 < a i ∧ (∑ j : Fin n, a j) = n * (n + 1) / 2 ∧ (∑ j : Fin n, (a j)^2) = n * (n + 1) * (2*n + 1) / 6)

description: Find expected number of matches in card problem.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1990_a1
(n : ℕ)
(hn : n > 0)
: (n : ℝ) * (n - 1) / 4 + 1 = (∑ k in Finset.Icc 1 n, k * (Nat.choose (n - 1) (k - 1))^2 * Nat.factorial (n - k) * Nat.factorial (n - k)) / Nat.factorial n

description: Prove inequality involving arctan of consecutive integers.
theorem:
theorem putnam_1991_a1
: ∀ n : ℕ, n > 0 → Real.arctan (n + 1 : ℝ) - Real.arctan n < 1 / (n^2 + n + 1)
